name: Larkspur Capital Corporation
overview: Larkspur Capital Corporation, a member of the NASD, is a private investment bank that specializes in private placements and financial advisory services for both private and public companies over a broad range of industries. Larkspur has been active since 1991 in structuring and privately placing debt and equity for companies seeking to raise capital for growth/expansion, later stage venture capital, acquisition financing, leveraged buyouts, going private transactions and restructuring/recapitalizations. The Firm maintains offices in New York and Palo Alto and has access to all levels of the institutional private debt and equity capital markets.
